issue.title: [Packaging][Debian] Add support for bookworm

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13633?focusedCommentId=17400053) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
What is "bookworm"? Could you explain more this?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13633?focusedCommentId=17400054) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Ah, it's the current testing code name.
